Description: Four beads in different shape and material. A: One biconical bead made of white faience. B: One segmented cylindrical bead made of white faience, four segments preserved, both ends broken off. C: One spherical bead, slightly irregular, with a blue band around it, now very faced, made of a glasslike material? D: One disc-shaped bead made of ostrich eggshell.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
